params_xml.title: Comparison 2 (much better / any better / better and better / the sooner the better)

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.

question.text: More and [^more | more] people every year suffer from hay fever.
Hay fever is an illness caused by pollen, a kind of powder from flowers and plants. [^The more | The more] pollen in the air, the greater the chance of hay fever.

params.instruct_panel_str: If you are unsure about how the animation above works click the "Instructions" button for help

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>
mcq_xml.multiAnswerFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="score"/><text> out of </text><val id="total"/><text> correct.</text>
mcq_xml.markedFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="percent"/><text>% for this marked interaction.</text>

question.text: People who have hay fever often have red eyes and sneeze [far more | the more] than normal. Living with hay fever can be very difficult.
question.modelAnswerString:
People who have hay fever often have red eyes and sneeze far more than normal.
Living with hay fever can be very difficult.

question.text: Some hay fever sufferers move to a different part of the country rather than live with the problem [any more | far more] .
question.modelAnswerString: Some hay fever sufferers move to a different part of the country rather than live with the problem any more.

question.text: They feel that the sooner they are free of hay fever, [the more | more] comfortable their lives will be.
question.modelAnswerString: They feel that the sooner they are free of hay fever, the more comfortable their lives will be.

question.text: Others decide to take drugs to fight the problem. However, most drugs aren't very effective and they only make things [slightly better | little better] .
question.modelAnswerString: Others decide to take drugs to fight the problem. However, most drugs aren't very effective and they only make things slightly better.

question.text: Also, some research shows that the more hay fever sufferers use these drugs, [the less | less] effective they are.
question.modelAnswerString:
Also, some research shows that the more hay fever sufferers use these drugs, the less
effective they are.

question.text: Sometimes drugs make things [no | not any] better, and they can make symptoms worse.
question.modelAnswerString: Sometimes drugs make things no better, and they can make symptoms worse.

question.text: Perhaps nature has the answer. Some hay fever sufferers find that their symptoms get [a lot | the better and] better if they eat green vegetables, which have vitamin C.
question.modelAnswerString:
Perhaps nature has the answer. Some hay fever sufferers find that their symptoms get
a lot better if they eat green vegetables, which have vitamin C.

question.text:
That's why the use of vitamin C among hay fever sufferers is becoming [more and more | the more]
popular these days.
question.modelAnswerString: That's why the use of vitamin C among hay ever sufferers is becoming more and more popular these days.

question.text: Others find that [the more | more] soya milk, onions and garlic they eat, the better they feel.
question.modelAnswerString: Others find that the more soya milk, onions and garlic they eat, the better they feel.

question.text: One thing is certain. Hay fever is an increasing problem and [far more | the more] research is needed before sufferers can be free of this terrible burden.
question.modelAnswerString:
One thing is certain. Hay fever is an increasing problem and far more research is
needed before sufferers can be free of this terrible burden.
